noticeDescription:
NOTICE is given that in accordance with the City’s real estate disposal by-law, on May 14, 2021, a portion (floors 2-15 and a portion of the ground and basement levels) of City property located at 877 Yonge Street, legally described as LT 4-5 PL 235E Toronto; PT LT 1, B, C, D, E PL 241 Toronto; PT Yorkville Park Dr PL 241 Toronto (formerly lane PL 104) (AKA Gibson's Lane, 20 FT Public HWY running Ely from Yonge St) closed by EM38683 as in CA693267; S/T CA576802; City of Toronto, was declared surplus,. The Property has a total area of approximately 15,933 m2 ± (171,498 ft2 ±).  The City proposes to enter into a long term lease (21 years or more), with a non-profit operator who will manage the affordable housing program and provide support services.   

The following City official has information about the proposed disposition: Mr. Mark MacSorley, Tel: 416-392-3891, Metro Hall, 55 John Street, 2nd floor, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3C6. Enquiries may be made of the said official until the June 3rd, 2021.
title: Declaration of Surplus Properties
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
